amendment.description: To increase by 30 personnel the personnel end strength of the Air National Guard of the United States as of September 30, 2004, to provide personnel to improve the information operations capability of the Air National Guard of the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 806, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Amendment SA 806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 806 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S6895; text: CR S6895) To increase by 30 personnel the personnel end strength of the Air National Guard of the United States as of September 30, 2004, to provide personnel to improve the information operations capability of the Air National Guard of the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 806 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 806 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Biden.
